page.title: 07Vandalism
page.content: InTipton there is plenty of vandalism. There are windows being broken all of the time and spraying of paint on the walls. Every house that is empty has boards up because all of the windows have been broken, and the boards are covered with writing. On the lamp-posts the steel covers have been broken off so that the wires explode and catch fire.Then peoples lights go off because the lamp-posts are connected to the electricity mains. There are also a lot of broken bottles on the ground so that if you fall you cut yourself.There are broken-down walls too, that have been deliberately pushed down. Tipton is a depressing place!
